name: CGDataConsumerCallbacks
desc: A structure that contains pointers to callback functions that manage the copying of data for a data consumer.

items.name: var putBytes: CGDataConsumerPutBytesCallback?
items.desc: A pointer to a function that copies data to the data consumer. For more information, see CGDataConsumerPutBytesCallback.

items.name: var releaseConsumer: CGDataConsumerReleaseInfoCallback?
items.desc: A pointer to a function that handles clean-up for the data consumer, or NULL.
